sub_concepts.name: Distributed Systems
sub_concepts.definition: A system in which components located on networked computers communicate and coordinate their actions by passing messages.

sub_concepts.name: Concurrency
sub_concepts.definition: The ability of a system to deal with multiple tasks executing simultaneously.

sub_concepts.name: Parallel Computing
sub_concepts.definition: A type of computation in which many calculations or processes are carried out simultaneously.

sub_concepts.name: Cluster Computing
sub_concepts.definition: A type of computing in which multiple computers (often called nodes) work together as a single system.

sub_concepts.name: Grid Computing
sub_concepts.definition: A distributed computing approach that involves coordinating and sharing computing resources across multiple administrative domains.
